Sentencas: Sol-gel strategies are carefully evaluated and compared to synthesize electrolyte materials for Intermediate Temperature SOFCs (Solid Oxide Fuel Cells).
Titulo: Optimized Sol-Gel Routes to Synthesize Yttria-Stabilized Zirconia Thin Films as Solid Electrolytes for Solid Oxide Fuel Cells

Sentencas: Robust 10-20 mu m thick cubic Yttria-Stabilized Zirconia (YSZ), (Y2O3)(0.08)(ZrO2)(0.92), films have been prepared by using nanocomposite stable sols composed with sol-gel made YSZ binders and YSZ powder.
Titulo: Optimized Sol-Gel Routes to Synthesize Yttria-Stabilized Zirconia Thin Films as Solid Electrolytes for Solid Oxide Fuel Cells

Sentencas: Two different strategies have been investigated for the synthesis of 8YSZ binders: a mixed alkoxide-nitrate route in alcoholic media, and an environment-friendly hydrothermal route, in water media.
Titulo: Optimized Sol-Gel Routes to Synthesize Yttria-Stabilized Zirconia Thin Films as Solid Electrolytes for Solid Oxide Fuel Cells

Sentencas: Ionic conductivities of similar to 2.5 x 10(-2)
Titulo: Optimized Sol-Gel Routes to Synthesize Yttria-Stabilized Zirconia Thin Films as Solid Electrolytes for Solid Oxide Fuel Cells

Sentencas: S cm(-1) are obtained at 800 degrees C for powders made by the hydrothermal and the alkoxide routes.
Titulo: Optimized Sol-Gel Routes to Synthesize Yttria-Stabilized Zirconia Thin Films as Solid Electrolytes for Solid Oxide Fuel Cells

Sentencas: Films synthesized from composite sols that contain commercial YSZ powder and the organic binder or the water-based binder, have been deposited on YSZ-NiO cermets and integrated in an entire single fuel cell.
Titulo: Optimized Sol-Gel Routes to Synthesize Yttria-Stabilized Zirconia Thin Films as Solid Electrolytes for Solid Oxide Fuel Cells

Sentencas: The two optimized routes yield to gastight YSZ electrolytes.
Titulo: Optimized Sol-Gel Routes to Synthesize Yttria-Stabilized Zirconia Thin Films as Solid Electrolytes for Solid Oxide Fuel Cells

Sentencas: In particular with the organic-based binder, a maximum power density of 250 mW cm(-2) at 850 degrees C has been achieved.
Titulo: Optimized Sol-Gel Routes to Synthesize Yttria-Stabilized Zirconia Thin Films as Solid Electrolytes for Solid Oxide Fuel Cells

Sentencas: The proposed route can be extended to other materials for different applications such as ferroelectric and dielectric materials.
Titulo: Optimized Sol-Gel Routes to Synthesize Yttria-Stabilized Zirconia Thin Films as Solid Electrolytes for Solid Oxide Fuel Cells
